title: What can I do if my Wi-Fi connection constantly disconnects?
answer:
l   Make sure you are within the working range of the Wi-Fi hotspot.

l   Restart Wi-Fi on your phone or your wireless router.

l   Go to the Wi-Fi settings screen, touch **Advanced settings**, and touch **Keep Wi-Fi on during sleep**. From the displayed option menu, choose **Always**.

The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
